CustomField.formula: IF (OR(AND(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Effect"),NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Being Amended")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Being Renewed")))), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__AgreementExpire?id=" & Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_Expire", "Expire"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.label: Expire
